commitResults.messageTitle: add skeletal code for greeting and farewell
Add Level-1 requirements and Singlish mode
commitResults.messageBody:
Program has Level-0 requirements: Add greeting and farewell messages to Duke

Missing Level-1 requirements and customization

Adding the following features allows us to fufill Level-1 requirements
* add greetings during the start of the program
* add farewell messages when user inputs "bye"

Adding customization as encouraged on the CS2113 website
* add a Singlish mode in Duke with variations in text
* add a command "change lang" to toggle it on and off

Program has Level-1 requirements and Singlish mode.

Missing Level-2 requirements.

Adding the following features allows us to fufill Level-2 requirements.
* add the ability for user to enter up to 100 strings of text into a
list.
* return the list of texts entered when the command "list" is entered.
* stop program from echoing the text entered.

Program has Level-2 requirements.

Missing some features to prevent program from crashing.

Adding the following features allows us to catch these errors.
* add the ability to inform the user that the list is full
* stop the program from adding empty text into the list

Program has Level-2 requirements.

Missing level-3 requirements.

Adding the following features allows us to fulfill level-3 requirements.
* add the ability for user to mark and unmark a task on the list
* implement a Task Class as the data structure for tasks in a list

commitResults.messageTitle: Update codebase to follow a coding standard
commitResults.messageBody:
Program has Level-3 requirements.

Does not following a particular coding standard.

Implementing the following changes allows us to follow a coding standard
* change codebase to follow the following java coding standard:
https://se-education.org/guides/conventions/java/basic.html

commitResults.messageTitle: Change how the list of tasks is stored
commitResults.messageBody:
Tasks are currently stored in a fixed-sized array.

Lacking the ability to store more than 100 tasks in the list.

Adding the following features allows us to add more than 100 tasks to
the list.
* change the underlying data structure to ArrayList
* amend affected methods by the change of data structure

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for 3 types of tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Program has Level-3 requirements.

Missing level-4 requirements.

Adding the following features partially allows us to fulfill level-4
requirements.
* add the ability for user to label tasks as TODO, DEADLINE or
EVENT when adding them into the list

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for 3 types of tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Only one type of task is supported (TODO).

Missing the ability to add tasks with dates, which is a level-4
requirement

Adding the following features partially allows us to fulfill the level-4
requirements
* allow user to add 3 types of tasks: "todo", "deadline" and "event"
* allow user to mark and unmark them like previously

commitResults.messageTitle: Edit runtest.bat file to match Class in folder
